equipment-plan: Seismic survey operations using non-invasive geophysical methods. Equipment specification: 1) Vibroseis trucks (4 units) with maximum operating height of 4.5 meters, 2) Recording equipment trailer with seismic data acquisition system, 3) Survey support vehicles including pickup trucks and utility vehicles, 4) Portable welfare units and temporary site offices, 5) Geophone arrays and connecting cables, 6) GPS positioning equipment for precise survey mapping. All operations conducted from existing roads and temporary access routes.
